text: Joao Capistrano Maria Bussotti Neves Junior (born 10 May 1993 in Maputo) is a Mozambican-born Italian middle-distance runner competing primarily in the 1500 metres. He won three times the national championships. ==Biography== Bussotti Neves emigrated to Italy with his mother Claudine in 2002. His step father is from Livorno where Joao lives and trains. He took up athletics in 2007. He was cleared by IAAF to compete for Italy since May 2012.2016 EC bio ==Personal bests== Outdoor *800 metres – 1:47.55 (Orvieto 2016) *1500 metres – 3:37.12 (Marseille 2017) Indoor *1500 metres – 3:42.82 (Prague 2015) ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2012 |World Junior Championships |Barcelona, Spain |20th (h) |1500 m |3:49.37 |- |rowspan=2|2015 |European Indoor Championships |Prague, Czech Republic |7th (h) |1500 m |3:42.82 |- |European U23 Championships |Tallinn, Estonia |4th |1500 m |3:45.10 |- |2016 |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |12th |1500 m |3:50.43 |- |rowspan=2|2017 |World Cross Country Championships |Kampala, Uganda |10th |4x2 km mixed relay |25:14 |- |Universiade |Taipei, Taiwan |12th (h) |1500 m |3:46.89 |- |rowspan=2|2018 |Mediterranean Games |Tarragona, Spain |8th |1500 m |3:42.34 |- |European Championships |Berlin, Germany |11th |1500 m |3:41.31 |} ==National titles== * Italian Athletics Championships ** 1500 metres: 2017, 2018 * Italian Indoor Athletics Championships ** 800 metres: 2015 ** 1500 metres: 2015 ==See also== *Naturalized athletes of Italy ==References== ==External links== * * Joao Bussotti at FIDAL Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maputo Category:Italian male middle-distance runners Category:Italian people of Mozambican descent Category:Athletics competitors of Gruppo Sportivo Esercito Category:Naturalised citizens of Italy Category:Mozambican emigrants to Italy
title: Joao Bussotti
